name: datn-source
description: Root package to run both API and Web

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "API,WEB" -c "blue,magenta" "npm run start:dev --prefix api" "npm run dev --prefix web"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "API,WEB" -c "blue,magenta" "npm run start:dev --prefix api" "npm run dev --prefix web"
